data.value: Single-page application running in the browser

data.name: OpenSourceMultiTenantPlatform
data.value: Open-source Multi-tenant MCP Service Management Platform

data.name: LandingPageSubtitle
data.value: Built with .NET 10 and Blazor WebAssembly, providing flexible Model Context Protocol service configuration and management capabilities for Xiaozhi AI Assistant

data.name: MultiTenantDescription
data.value: Based on Keycloak OpenID Connect authentication, each user can independently configure their own MCP services and Xiaozhi connections

data.name: FlexibleServiceBindingDescription
data.value: Bind different MCP services to specified Xiaozhi nodes, supporting multiple authentication methods and configuration modes

data.name: ModernTechStackDescription
data.value: Using .NET 10, Blazor WebAssembly, MudBlazor UI, and .NET Aspire cloud-native orchestration

data.name: FrontendBackendSeparation
data.value: Frontend-backend separation, API and Web UI independently deployed

data.name: MultiDatabaseSupport
data.value: Support for PostgreSQL and SQLite multiple databases

data.name: FollowLvYinAGang
data.value: Follow LvYin AGang, explore the world of AI and hardware makers together

data.name: Step1LoginSystemDescription
data.value: Login to the platform using your Keycloak account

data.name: Step2ConfigureXiaozhiDescription
data.value: Add your Xiaozhi AI server address

data.name: Step3CreateMcpServiceDescription
data.value: Configure MCP service, supporting multiple authentication methods

data.name: Step4BindServiceDescription
data.value: Bind MCP service to Xiaozhi node and start using

data.value: Starting to sync all MCP service tools...

data.value: View and manage all users' MCP services

data.name: Support_Subtitle
data.value: Thank you for using Verdure MCP Platform! If you find it helpful, welcome to support our development work in the following ways.

data.name: Support_BilibiliDesc
data.value: Follow me on Bilibili for the latest tech shares, tutorials and project updates. Like, coin and collect is the biggest support for me!

data.name: Support_ChargeDesc
data.value: If you find my content helpful, you can support my creation through Bilibili charge feature, giving me more motivation to create quality content.

data.name: Support_DonateDesc
data.value: Scan the QR code below to donate directly, your support will be used for server maintenance, feature development and more quality content creation.

data.name: Support_StarDesc
data.value: Give our project a Star on GitHub to help more people discover it

data.name: Support_ShareDesc
data.value: Share this service with your friends to benefit more people

data.name: Support_BugDesc
data.value: Found a bug or have improvement suggestions? Welcome to submit an Issue

data.name: Support_ContributeDesc
data.value: Welcome to submit PR, let's make the project better together

data.name: Support_ThanksDesc
data.value: Every support is our motivation to move forward, let's build a better MCP service ecosystem together!

data.name: Support_CtaDesc
data.value: If Verdure MCP Platform helps you, consider following, starring, or donating to keep it growing.

data.name: QrCode_ScanHint
data.value: Use WeChat or Alipay to scan the QR code below to donate

data.name: QrCode_Thanks
data.value: Thank you for your support! Every donation will be used for server maintenance and feature development.
